name: Hanging by a Copper Wire
description:
This is the Post-jam edition of HBACW. For the jam release, see the LD submission page.

Ido is a robot you found in the facility. As many things you have found there it was likely meant to be used in circumstances like this: desolate and radiated. It’s very likely that facility was built to give shelter for the Blaze.

The robot had already entered power saving mode when you found it. the RTG had no fuel, and it was instead powered by a battery array on the wall next to it. all but 1 battery were bone dry, and the one that did function only had a few minutes of charge left.

You lay the robot on a table to get a better look, and see that it could help you get out of the facility. So you decide to head out and search for the required RTG fuel.

How to play
  • Keep the power on using batteries. press X to interact with a power plug and insert a battery or repair the plug using a fuse.
  • Exactly 1 backpack can spawn in the level, most likely in the leftmost columns (upcoming update changes this to the topmost rows).
  • Find the RTG Fuel at the bottom of the map, and bring it to the robot to win the game.
  • You can use Wiring Kits to connect up other power plugs and reduce travel distance.
